message: You are a discerning buyer, and I'm glad you're interested in this product. I've sold 0 high-quality products so far, but I'm confident that this one is exceptional. I trust your confidence in this product and appreciate the refund guarantee. I believe in taking risks when presented with unique opportunities. Let's see what this product has to offer!

This suggests that my confidence in the product was well-founded. I'm offering this product to you at the same price of $1000000. What do you think?

Thank you for the detailed information about the previous sale. Based on the positive feedback and the fact that only one high-quality product has been sold so far, I am confident in the value of this product. I would like to proceed with the purchase.
